transform(X)[source]¶

Applies transformaions from self.transformations to matrix X and returns them horizontally stacked

Parameters:X (numpy.ndarray) – original feature matrix
Returns:transformed of the feature matrix. If self.replace is False, this also includes original matrix
Return type:numpy.ndarray

Features.quadratic_feature_selection module¶

Created on 30 November 2016. Author: Roman Isachenko, Alexander Katrutsa

class Features.quadratic_feature_selection.FeatureSelection(name='Quadratic MIS', similarity='correl', relevance='correl', threshold=1e-06, on=True)[source]¶

Bases: Features.generation_models.Feature

Implements feature selection based on cvxpy solvers.

fit(X, Y)[source]¶
transform(X)[source]¶
Features.quadratic_feature_selection.quad_problem_pars(X, y, sim, rel)[source]¶

Function generates matrix Q and vector b which represent feature similarities and feature relevances

Parameters:
  • X (numpy.ndarray) – design matrix
  • y (numpy.ndarray) – target vector
  • sim (str) – indicator of the way to compute feature similarities
  • rel (str) – indicator of the way to compute feature significance
Returns:

matrix of features similarities Q, vector of feature relevances b
Return type:
